item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CRM Perks Contact Form Entries plugin <=Â 1.3.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34756|2024-08-02T02:59:22.414Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20contact%20form%207%20hubspot
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for Contact Form 7 HubSpot.This issue affects Integration for Contact Form 7 HubSpot: from n/a through 1.3.1.
